author: Staff Reporter
text:
Festivities:Government Nursing College students celebrating Pongal at Government Hospital in Tuticorin on Tuesday.— Photo : N.Rajesh

Students of Nursing School, attached to Tuticorin Government Medical College Hospital, celebrated Pongal here on Tuesday.

The programme was inaugurated by Dean B. Shanthakumar.

Several competitions were organised as part of the celebrations. They prepared sweet pongal and distributed it to all.

The students were clad in saris reflecting the Tamil culture.

Events such as pot breaking and rangoli were also organized.

Principal of the college Eswari, Resident Medical Officer Silas Jayamani and specialists took part in the programme.
title: Students celebrate Pongal
